creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has iridescent gold ground with purple at R and L edges, linear knot-like design in white and solid grey organic knot-like shape; bottom sheet has orange ground with linear white loops and cone-like "cages" and red linear coils
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and C See Inscription
title: In Step Out of Step VI
